Summary: Saw what appeared to be a commercial aircraft at first glance then It stopped & hovered for about a minute continued for about 10 degrees and stopped again this time for 40 min. see pictures attached. hit Zoom a few times
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Temecula

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAT around 4pm I was repairing Nutcrackers in my garage for X-mas, I had this sudden interest to look in the sky I walked out onto the driveway looked up facing S.E. about 40 degrees' up from horizon 10 degrees up from top of Palomar mtn in the sky & saw what appeared to be a commercial aircraft at first glance then It stopped & hovered for about a minute continued for about 10 degrees and stopped again this time for 40 min. see picture attached. I wanted to believe I just lost sight of it and by accident focused in on a star. now 5:20 pm I look up at the same spot , nothing. No stars aren't visible as of yet and nothing there. This experience has convinced me something or someone is observing this area and or planet as a whole.
